inclusion.criterion: Age higher than or equal to 65
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the capacity to perform geriatric assessment tests
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: sinus rhythm at the time of evaluation (for the evaluation of HRV only)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: altered cognitive abilities such as to impair the evaluation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability or unwillingness to sign informed consent
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
